reviews.text:
A Memorable Trip to Mahabalipuram Beach

Last October, I had the most unforgettable trip with my parents to Mahabalipuram Beach in Tamil Nadu. It was truly one of the best experiences of my life. The scenic beauty of the beach, with its golden sand and calming waves, immediately put us in a peaceful mood. The weather was perfect, and the sea breeze added to the charm of the place.

We started our day by exploring the ancient shore temple, which stands as a magnificent reminder of India's rich cultural heritage. The intricate carvings and the sound of the ocean nearby made it a magical experience. We also visited the Five Rathas and Arjuna's Penance, which left us amazed by the craftsmanship of ancient times.

Spending time on the beach with my parents was the most special part. We took long walks, collected seashells, and clicked lots of pictures. Watching the sunset together was a highlight - the sky turned shades of orange and pink, and it felt like a dream.

The local food was delicious, especially the fresh seafood served in the beachside stalls. We also shopped for handmade souvenirs and shell crafts, which added a personal touch to our trip.

This trip brought us even closer as a family. Mahabalipuram gave us not just beautiful memories but also a deep sense of joy and togetherness. I highly recommend visiting this lovely place - it's perfect for families and those looking for peace, history, and natural beauty all in one.

Mahabalipuram Beach is a serene and scenic getaway with golden sands, blue waters, and a peaceful atmosphere. The beach is less crowded than Chennai's city beaches, making it perfect for a relaxing walk or enjoying the sea breeze.
The nearby rock-cut temples and monuments add a historical charm to the place. Watching the sunrise here is a magical experience, and the waves are great for photography. While swimming isn't recommended due to strong currents, the beach is ideal for unwinding and enjoying local seafood.

Mammalapuram Beach encapsulates a harmonious blend of coastal serenity and architectural grandeur. While cleanliness and ocean safety are valid concerns, the jaw‚Äëdropping temple views, artisanal street vibe, and tranquil stretches of sand make it a memorable stop - especially for anyone touring Chennai and Tamil Nadu's sacred sites.

reviews.text:
From the moment I arrived at Chariot Beach Resort, I felt a deep sense of peace and luxury. The property is vast, beautifully maintained, and opens right onto a stunning stretch of beach soft sand, clean waves, and pure serenity.

The staff were incredibly warm, helpful, and attentive. Every interaction felt genuine and full of care. Special thanks to the front desk and housekeeping and restaurant  staffs for making everything seamless.

My room was spacious, spotless, and perfectly comfortable, with a lovely view and the sound of the ocean in the background. The pool area is a total highlight ideal for both relaxation and fun. And the food? Outstanding. Every meal at their restaurants was fresh, flavorful, and served with grace. The seafood in particular was a standout.

The resort is perfectly located near all of Mahabalipuram's major sights like the Shore Temple and Five Rathas-which made exploring effortless. But honestly, just being on the property itself is an experience.

Whether you're coming to unwind, explore heritage, or just escape into nature, this place delivers. I left feeling recharged, inspired, and already dreaming of my next visit.

Highly, highly recommended.

Chariot Beach Resort, Mahabalipuram (Stay: 18‚Äì20 April 2025)
April 2025

We stayed at Chariot Beach Resort for two nights (18‚Äì20 April'25) , having booked an Executive Deluxe room with an extra bed. While the property itself is spacious and scenic, the overall experience was disappointing, especially considering the premium price point.

The room was average, and the bathroom appeared more like a makeshift setup-far below expectations. Key amenities were either missing or non-functional: the hair dryer didn't work initially (a replacement was provided later), the television wasn't working throughout the stay despite multiple complaints, and there was no hot water. Returning drenched from the beach, both my children (aged 1 and 6) had to bathe in cold water, and the chill even caused discomfort to my elder kid.

Repeated complaints about the TV and hot water went unanswered. The staff seemed unresponsive, and resolution came only after escalation by Chef Karthik-who, despite it being outside his scope, was proactive and supportive. Eventually, we were moved to a cottage at 10 PM on the second night, which felt too little, too late.

One saving grace was the team at the restaurant. Chef Karthik and his superior were genuinely thoughtful, and the GM himself assisted in preparing baby food-something the hotel does not charge for, which was appreciated. The pool was another highlight, with the kids thoroughly enjoying their time there.

Overall, while the property has potential, the lack of basic room checks and poor responsiveness to issues made the experience underwhelming. Hope the management works on service quality to match the property's promise.

Had a pleasant check-in experience with a warm welcome from the front office team. The resort is set on a huge property with rooms located conveniently close to the beach, and the staff were courteous and helpful throughout our stay.

The swimming pool is spacious, with a good number of shower areas and towels available, which added to the comfort.

However, the rooms did not quite match the price point - the AC was quite loud, and the bathrooms were maintained at a basic level. The breakfast buffet spread was limited, with a strong focus on South Indian cuisine and very few continental options.

For a resort of this scale and pricing, there's definitely room for improvement in the overall standard and upkeep of the rooms.

reviews.text:
Food:

The food experience at the resort was truly delightful. The spread offered a variety of dishes, each thoughtfully prepared with local ingredients. Whether it was the delicious appetizers, flavorful main courses, or indulgent desserts, every meal was an enjoyable experience. The staff was attentive and ensured our dietary preferences were catered to. I especially loved [Pepper prawn fry]. The atmosphere in the dining area was warm and inviting, making me feel like I was part of something special.

Hospitality:

The hospitality at the resort was exceptional. Every staff member, from the reception to the restaurant servers, was incredibly friendly, professional, and eager to make our day trip memorable. A special mention to Sai Priya, who went above and beyond in making us feel welcome. She was attentive, approachable, and ensured our dining experience was seamless. The entire staff's attention to detail, from providing extra amenities to anticipating our needs without being intrusive, was impressive. It truly felt like they cared about making our visit as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

Overall Experience:

In addition to the fantastic food and excellent hospitality, the resort offered a range of activities and a beautiful setting that made our trip unforgettable. The ambiance was relaxing yet lively, with stunning views and peaceful surroundings. Whether you're here for a quick getaway or a longer stay, the resort provides a well-rounded experience that appeals to all senses. I left feeling completely refreshed and eager to return.

A Perfect Corporate Getaway at Ideal Beach Resort üåäüå¥

Our recent corporate event at Ideal Beach Resort was an absolutely memorable experience! From the initial planning to the final wrap up, every detail was handled with such care and precision, thanks to the excellent coordination by Mr. Senthil. He ensured that everything from getting the pricing right to organizing each element was spot on.

We were a large team of 300 members, and yet, the entire event ran smoothly without a hitch. A special thanks to Priya, who managed the welcome, tagging, and smooth entry to the Waves location with great attention to detail.

A big appreciation goes to Kandhan, who was instrumental in overall event management. From coordinating logistics to supporting every aspect of the day, his efforts ensured everything ran seamlessly and efficiently behind the scenes.

The food experience was another major highlight
Last year, we were delighted by Chef Munnusamy, whose dishes left a lasting impression, and this time, Chef Manoj matched that same level of excellence. We were happy to know they are part of the same talented culinary team. The food was flavorful, fresh, and satisfying - just what we needed after a day full of engaging activities.

The overall atmosphere was simply fantabulous - relaxing, energizing, and filled with joy. Whether it was the scenic beachside setting, the thoughtful hospitality, or the delicious food, Ideal Beach Resort delivered an experience our team will remember and cherish.

Highly recommended for corporate outings, team retreats, or any group event where you want the perfect mix of nature, comfort, and top notch service.

A Technician was called and by bedtime the temperature was at 88 degrees -- 7 hours after arrival. During the night they offered us the adjoining Suite -- a larger room that was at 88 degrees as well. By morning our original room was at a balmy 86 degrees. Uninhabitable! Management offered us a room at their sister Hotel -- Silversands Beach. That room was immediately adjacent to an outdoor Restaurant not part of the Hotel. Relaxing? Being handicapped, that mountainous Property was not appropriate at all.  We told Management that we could not endure these conditions and were leaving. After meeting with the Manager, we were offered a $1600 Courtesy Refund against the $8000 we had prepaid. They stressed "NO REFUNDS"! With no choice we left anyway and found a wonderful oceanfront Hotel a mile away to have the "relaxing vacation" we counted on. Management at Silversands was completely unapologetic about the insufficient A/C, and zeroed in only on the 2 options they offered us. In addition, their "highly touted" Infinity Pool was under construction with 7 workers constantly drilling and hammering that went on until 7:30 PM that first and only night. places.generalDescription: Sea Breeze Beach Resort is a casual hotel with simple rooms that offer views of the sea. Situated just 100m from Mahabalipuram Beach, this family-friendly resort provides various amenities including kids' swimming pool, outdoor play equipment, indoor play area, and free wifi. Guests can also enjoy activities such as badminton, biking, and tennis. The well-furnished rooms feature sofas and balconies. The resort boasts a seaside restaurant, wellness center, and palm garden.

sources.snippet: Offering a peaceful massage parlor and an exotic swimming pool, the Sea Breeze Beach Resort is considered to be a perfect getaway from the hustling and bustling life of Mahabalipuram. Situated near the Mahabalipuram Beach, the property offers high-class accommodations with air-conditioner, satellite TV, and a private bathroom with up-to-date toiletries. Besides, here, you will also be able to find a huge tennis court, a separate indoor gaming room, and a lush green garden.

reviews.text: My family is very happy to enjoy the spot. Beach access is very near. Good ambience with great taste of food. A good and pleasant staying resort for family.

I booked a super deluxe room which costs 5.2k/night. When I reached the place and see there super deluxe room I was shocked. It was smelling bad like people are not coming to the resort. The cupboard doors were broken. When I asked reception they said this is the only room. The whole resort was empty only 4 rooms were booked that day. I checked it in the morning during breakfast.
Even though the resort touched the beach but management is not capable to maintain the entity. As the resort touched beach so I gave 3 stars for the location.

Words cannot describe what I experienced, it is so good.. This is the best of all the resorts in the area.. Assistant general Manager SHADAB SHAIKH  Sir, we thank you very much for all the arrangements you made. I saw a good attitude from you, with love and respect, with good care. Thank you sir.
